We love how high above the clouds this shot is. If you look closely you'll also spot another balloon emerging from the clouds below.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image122-3pzv4r57om.jpg\" /></p><h2>Climbing for a selfie</h2><p>There's something about climbing mountainsides and snapping selfies. These downward facing selfies are no doubt a lot easier to capture with a small GoPro.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image123-7jo0ydlwti.jpg\" /></p><h2>Wave free shipping</h2><p>We're impressed with how still the water is here. Even the large ship isn't making waves through these still waters and spoiling the view.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image124-jaos0z9u7q.jpg\" /></p><h2>Making a splash</h2><p>Another angle of surfing fun. Sticking a GoPro to a surfboard nearly always results in some pretty special shots. This angle gives a view you're not likely to see unless you're bodyboarding instead.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image125-dr1p43woqi.jpg\" /></p><h2>Wildlife photography made easy</h2><p>Capturing animal portraits is easy when they're curious. This little feathered guy has taken a particular interest in the GoPro and has sidled up for a closer look.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image126-kqaxm1ushz.jpg\" /></p><h2>Tricks and timing&nbsp;</h2><p>Capturing great action photos isn't all about the trick, it's also about timing. Catching some air while also snapping isn't easy, but when it comes off, the results are fantastic.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image127-r30ebuay7o.jpg\" /></p><h2>Ruff rider</h2><p>This pooch might be enjoying some board time, but something else in the distance has got his attention. Makes for another brilliant photo though.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image128-tvgfklmcnl.jpg\" /></p><h2>A killer photo</h2><p>Just when you thought a landscape like this couldn't get any better looking, along comes a whale to improve the scene. A quick snap and the view is captured forever.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image129-bwruzbc5cn.jpg\" /></p><h2>A wild ride</h2><p>A high up view of a snowboarder's paradise. This incredible view must be enticing, if not fraught with danger and icy chills.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image130-ogmuewqrfz.jpg\" /></p><h2>A peaceful horizon</h2><p>There's no denying this is a brilliant view of the landscape nicely coloured by the setting sun.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image131-sohpkytcyl.jpg\" /></p><h2>It's peddle time</h2><p>We'd imagine cycling underwater would be pretty tricky. It does, however, make for an awesome photo. Daft, but awesome.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image132-c6my4bbayx.jpg\" /></p><h2>White on white</h2><p>A quick glimpse of this photo and you might miss the glider that's almost camouflaged by the equally white snow on the floor below.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image133-yhpfm9kqun.jpg\" /></p><h2>Parachuting shenanigans</h2><p>We love the idea of parachuting with a giant inflatable. They probably aren't much use for slowing you down, but the photographic results are pretty unique. Plus, if you can land in a swimming pool or at the beach, you can get right into some water-based fun too.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image134-ckukhziga8.jpg\" /></p><h2>Northern lights</h2><p>Another GoPro snap showing the wonderful colours of the Northern lights illuminating the night's sky.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image135-0mn9ofpplw.jpg\" /></p><h2>A monkey call</h2><p>This photo is great, it looks like this little guy is calling out to his friends about his new discovery. \"Look what I've found guys, some human has left us a camera!\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-news-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image136-pb58zwq4vm.jpg\" /></p><h2>Dolphin diving</h2><p>Dolphins are known for being playful. We're surprised he's not bothered by the large ship making waves behind him. Makes for an awesome snap though.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image139-qrjceledlg.jpg\" /></p><h2>Ready for lift-off</h2><p>A colourful waterborne shot from the tropical paradise of Fiji. This view shows a seaplane readying for take-off from the crystal clear waters.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image140-sfakn5es9l.jpg\" /></p><h2>Rest in the middle of the lake</h2><p>A brilliantly beautiful view of a manmade bridge stretching across a peaceful lakeside.&nbsp;Alba Lleshi snapped this image while walking around the lake and stopping for a rest.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image141-2skhva7fgm.jpg\" /></p><h2>Piggy piggy</h2><p>It turns out that pigs don't just like rolling in mud, they also like a nice dip in the sea too. This photo shows a cute pig taking a swim in the crystal clear waters of the&nbsp;Bahamas.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image142-lqwxhzpvj2.jpg\" /></p><h2>Dolphins in Hawaii</h2><p>A smashing view captured while swimming with the dolphins off the coast of Hawaii. This underwater photo by Connor Trimble shows what an amazing world we live in.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image143-zld5lvrsbo.jpg\" /></p><h2>Wild Christmas</h2><p>Not your usual Christmas view - this photo was taken on Christmas Eve on the&nbsp;volcanic island of Lanzarote in the Canary Islands. Peaceful roads for a man to enjoy with just his motorbike and the cool winter winds to keep him company.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image144-b0ueateksz.jpg\" /></p><h2>Dog in the hole</h2><p>\"When your dog starts to make a hole in the sand of the beach and you end up burying it in it\"</p><p>Miriam Borrego Ruiz was clearly having some daft fun at the beach and that's certainly one cooperative pooch!</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image145-inevl90tqg.jpg\" /></p><h2>Fall time</h2><p>A serene view of a perfectly still lake in Northern Italy.&nbsp;Alberto Rossetto snapped this image while on an adventurous bike ride. The brilliant colours of the Autumnal trees contrasting wonderfully with the cool waters of the lake.&nbsp;</p><p><em><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image146-bygnys0z1o.jpg\" /></em></p><h2>What a night</h2><p>This image is actually the combination of 400 photos into a single one. The result is what looks like a thousand shooting stars in the sky. Pretty spectacular, we're sure you'll agree.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image147-qke1fj7onc.jpg\" /></p><h2>Freediving in sea caves</h2><p>Victor De Valles shows us just how versatile GoPro cameras can be with a brilliant underwater snap captured as he freedives with the fishes. We love how the light breaks through the water in this image. A simple, yet wonderful view of nature.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image148-xlhdebf1mq.jpg\" /></p><h2>Machu Pichu</h2><p>Machu Pichu is an Incan citadel nestled in the&nbsp;Andes Mountains high above Peru. It's a popular tourist destination for the region and with this sort of breath-taking view, it's easy to see why.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image149-ox54kpcbx8.jpg\" /></p><h2>Wingsuit flying with clouds and friends</h2><p>Another astounding Overcapture view above the clouds, proving again why GoPro cameras are such a strong favourite with skydivers.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image150-obifgpxw1c.jpg\" /></p><h2>Sunrise skateboarding</h2><p>A lone skateboarder makes the most of a winding and empty road on an early morning. The sun slowly creeps over the mountaintop as a new day begins. Another brilliantly simple shot chosen as photo of the day.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image151-p7jfrwsbh2.jpg\" /></p><h2>Powder lines with a view</h2><p>A solitary snowboarder appears at the edge of this snap, barely visible in the jaw-dropping view of the snow-covered expanse that lays before them. Marvellous, untouched white powder stretches out as far as the eye can see. A snowboarder's paradise indeed.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image152-9pqqa7hr3a.jpg\" /></p><h2>Atop the emerald ocean</h2><p>Forward-facing shots from the bow of a boat seem to be a firm favourite amongst GoPro users. This one is pretty special too. The sparkling emerald waters glisten below the green-topped hillsides. Relaxing, calm and tranquil, this photo certainly inspires a warm happy feeling at how serene nature can be.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image153-243ctxvrhn.jpg\" /></p><h2>Whitewater wonder</h2><p>Sun breaking through the tree line, whitewater rapids beckoning in the distance, a GoPro strapped to a helmet. We have no doubt there were quite a few awesome photos taken on this kayaking ride, but this one is something special. The quiet before the storm? Or simply a fantastic view of nature at its best.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image154-ywwv5gpytm.jpg\" /></p><h2>Communing with nature</h2><p>GoPro photographer Mike Maholias warms his hands by an open fire as he communes with nature and relaxes by the peaceful waters of this still lake. This photo certainly makes us marvel at how many wonderful elements of nature can be squeezed into a single snap.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image155-d2gqhw7uf9.jpg\" /></p><h2>Swimming with the fishes</h2><p>GoPro cameras are special because of how flexible they are. The underwater housing once again works its magic as&nbsp;Jeb Corliss captures a shoal of fish passing by with a few sharks thrown in for good measure. A range of creatures caught on camera peacefully and harmoniously floating around in the warm waters. &nbsp;What could be a better fit for a competition about the environment we live in than this?&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image156-02i9hdftov.jpg\" /></p><h2>Don't look down</h2><p>With a slightly less relaxing mountainous view,&nbsp;Victoria Nader shows us what a rather steep descent might look like. We're pleased to be viewing this one from a safe distance but have to admire the courage of the photographer and the wonder of the view.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image157-1cqswlypng.jpg\" /></p><h2>A peaceful paddle</h2><p>This GoPro enthusiast&nbsp;took man's best friend along for the ride on these calm lake waters. A beautiful scene lays before them and pooch seems to be contemplating the wonders of his life as he stares off into the distance.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image162-1hwkrk2eds.jpg\" /></p><h2>Seeing double</h2><p>This image by&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/cesahp/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"follow noopener\">Cesar Palacios</a> shows a brilliant view from Mexico with a crystal clear reflection of the skies above snapped during a brilliant cityscape.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image163-w7eiah6bdk.jpg\" /></p><h2>Sky diving fun</h2><p>The awesome GoPro is obviously an incredibly versatile camera and perfect for extreme sports, like diving out of perfectly good aeroplanes.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image164-chbt4rihsv.jpg\" /></p><h2>Ocean Sunfish</h2><p>At first glance, you might think this was a man swimming with a shark or a wale but it's actually an Ocean Sunfish. Apparently one of the heaviest bony fish in the world and also one of the most fertile. ttps://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx10/cdn36@2020_6/2020/08/24/23-36-58-931_ccb040ac601d4f8b.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image146-bygnys0z1o.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx16/cdn75@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-37-19-207_50aa72ff7b9aae18.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image147-qke1fj7onc.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx6/cdn94@2020_6/2020/08/24/23-37-21-987_d20b40a0b5566ea2.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image148-xlhdebf1mq.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn56@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-36-55-571_89a1dc1fc0913fdf.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image149-ox54kpcbx8.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn12@2020_5/2020/08/24/23-37-16-838_25562dd92f5ea9b6.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image150-obifgpxw1c.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn54@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-37-01-730_2cf0683a3e1b6530.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image151-p7jfrwsbh2.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn95@2020_5/2020/08/24/23-37-19-729_cbcc0d40ea5547b8.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image152-9pqqa7hr3a.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn16@2020_2/2020/08/24/23-36-56-533_f5515fb008b82f20.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image153-243ctxvrhn.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx23/cdn84@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-36-54-187_73f4f6697100b654.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image154-ywwv5gpytm.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn79@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-37-06-214_df1880d430aeea3b.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image155-d2gqhw7uf9.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn79@2020_2/2020/08/24/23-36-56-730_7eaa8f449d3b397d.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image156-02i9hdftov.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx8/cdn61@2020_6/2020/08/24/23-37-01-419_ab536270c93d1f3a.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image157-1cqswlypng.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn43@2020_4/2020/08/24/23-37-27-308_43dac90297cdd556.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image162-1hwkrk2eds.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn77@2020_3/2020/08/24/23-37-01-861_f02587ba6144eaad.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image163-w7eiah6bdk.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx29/cdn7@2020_1/2020/08/24/23-37-16-309_0d71442313d48862.webp","https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/131203-cameras-feature-the-best-gopro-photos-in-the-world-prepare-to-lose-your-breath-image164-chbt4rihsv.jpg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx33/cdn96@2020_5/2020/08/24/23-37-06-836_b8c4ea0e29b53b9b.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1598312209022},{"createdTime":"2020-08-25 07:36:49","updatedTime":"2020-08-25 07:36:49","title":"Best drone photos ever: Stunning images taken from the sky","link":"https://www.pocket-lint.com/drones/news/133911-best-drone-photos-ever-stunning-images-taken-from-up-high","description":"<img width=\"748\" height=\"498\" src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/748x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-dzuyo4l1dm.jpg?v1\"> <p><a href=\"https://www.pocket-lint.com/drones/news/133911-best-drone-photos-ever-stunning-images-taken-from-up-high\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Drone photography</a> has soared in recent years, with the number of and quality of drone photos increasing every year. There are so many photos in fact that drone photography even has its own official awards programmes.</p>\n <ul> \n  <li><a href=\"https://www.pocket-lint.com/drones/buyers-guides/130265-best-drones-high-end-quadcopters-and-cheap-drones-to-buy\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">The best drones: Top rated quadcopters to buy, whatever your budget</a></li> \n </ul><p>Now that most new drones come equipped with high-quality cameras capable&nbsp;of capturing great shots and videos the images are only getting better and better. We say easier but that's not to say it's a walk in the park.&nbsp;</p><p>We've compiled some of the best photos we've seen as well as plenty more from Dronestagram and the <a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/events/photocontest2017\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Skypixel photo contest</a> to show off just how stunning drone photos can be. Get ready to pick your jaw up off the floor.</p>\n <ul> \n  <li><a href=\"https://www.pocket-lint.com/cameras/news/141560-19-amazing-aerial-photographs-with-a-new-perspective-of-the-world\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">19 amazing aerial photographs with a new perspective of the world</a></li> \n </ul><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-uopevcu0il.jpg\" /></p><h2>The star fort at Bourtange</h2><p>Fort Bourtange was originally built in&nbsp;1593 in the Netherlands to defend and control&nbsp;the road between&nbsp;Germany&nbsp;and the city of&nbsp;Groningen. It has seen a lot of history in the decades and centuries that have passed since and has recently, rather fittingly been converted into a historical museum.&nbsp;</p><p>From above,&nbsp;Fort Bourtange is certainly beautiful, surrounded by defensive moats and brilliant countryside.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-st0phlbt46.jpg\" /></p><h2>Savior on the Spilled Blood</h2><p>This is a magnificent view of a Church in Saint Petersburg, Russia. It shows the Church of the Savior on Spilled Blood. This incredible building originally began construction in 1893, and represents a romantic nationalism architectural style by&nbsp;Alfred Alexandrovich Parland and Archimandrite Ignaty.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-3hpselxob8.jpg\" /></p><h2>A deserted college</h2><p>This is a beautiful view of the countryside of the Republic of Abkhazia. It shows an amazing landscape with a tragic history as this is part of the region where <a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ethnic_cleansing_of_Georgians_in_Abkhazia\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"follow noopener\">ethnic cleansings</a> occurred in the 1990s. People were expelled from their homes, brutally murdered and persecuted. Now a broken, deserted college stands as a homage to this tragic time.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-0uqrydt7pn.jpg\" /></p><h2>Lotus Temple</h2><p>This is certainly a breath-taking view of an already awe-inspiring temple of worship. The Lotus Temple is located in Delhi, India and is famed for its flowerlike shape. It's also a place of wonder thanks to welcoming everyone - regardless of religious belief.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-gmhazjl2lq.jpg\" /></p><h2>Mont Saint Michel in the fog</h2><p>This breathtaking shot shows the famous French monastery&nbsp;Mont Saint Michel bathed in stunning morning fog. This image was also chosen as&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/contests/2018/winners\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"follow noopener\">the grand prize winner of 2018's Skypixel contest</a>.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-1osrd3kzlj.jpg\" /></p><h2>Bathing Hippos</h2><p>This image of bathing hippos won the first place prize in&nbsp;<a href=\"http://www.dronestagr.am/winners-announced-2018/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"follow noopener\">Dronestagram's 2018 drone photography awards</a>. The photographer,&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.instagram.com/p/BqsMUEGHGgL/\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"follow noopener\">Martin Sanchez</a>, said:</p><p>\"This by far was the highlight of my trip to Tanzania. I giant hippo party which was super VIP. But I knew exactly how to get in. Something they couldn’t resist. A game of Hungry Hungry Hippos!\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-klbytb8mnj.jpg\" /></p><h2>Sunrise in Bagan</h2><p>This brilliant drone photo was snapped in&nbsp;Bagan, Myanmar by Witold Ziomek. He used a Mavic Pro done to snap this brilliant photo of ancient architecture backdropped by hot air balloons.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-n7maizqr8j.jpg\" /></p><h2>Whoops</h2><p>An unhappy accident makes for a pretty awesome aerial photograph. A lorry has tipped over and spilt its load on the side of the road.&nbsp;Ilya Martyanov noticed the accident and quickly dashed out to send his drone up for a snap. The result of which is a fantastic drone photograph of the pitfalls of modern life.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-fjpmv5kaiu.jpg\" /></p><h2>The red train</h2><p>This brilliantly contrasting image from the sky shows a fantastic red train passing through the snow-covered mountains of Switzerland.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-qc0ubrylpz.jpg\" /></p><h2>Thin ice</h2><p>A weirdly beautiful black and white photograph that appears to show a vein-like pattern on the ice below. Perhaps the remains of a tree that's disappeared below the icy depths?&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-kmlqksc9qi.jpg\" /></p><h2>Happy boats</h2><p>A thoroughly cheerful view from the rivers of Singapore shows canoes from above, posing in a position that makes them look like a happy face. Of course, it could be an accident, but it's a happy accident if it is.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-zaykeha3em.jpg\" /></p><h2>Summer trim, France by jcourtial</h2><p>Jerome Courtial, a 39-year-old Frenchman based in London, went to Valensole to get \"an original picture rather than the classic view with the sunset in the background\". His girlfriend was with him, and in an interview after being chosen&nbsp;as the No. 1 winner of Dronestagram's 2017 awards, he thanked her for her patience, as they “waited quite a long time to find the perfect spot”. The photo ended up being&nbsp;his favourite picture ever taken.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ona245n61z.jpg\" /></p><h2>Dawn on mercury tower, Russia by Alexeygo</h2><p>Alexey Goncharov, a 36-years-old physicist who works at Moscow State University, said he sometimes takes drone photos before heading into work. One morning, while in search of a beautiful reflection in mirror windows of Mercury tower, he spotted industrial climbers: “I liked the way their work looked from that perspective. They seemed to wash the city itself, not just the building's windows.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ywmtfkybvj.jpg\" /></p><h2>Freewheeling</h2><p>This aerial image really plays tricks on the eye giving the impression of a cyclist mounting the side of a skyscraper.&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/free-wheeling\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Nigel Kwan's image</a>&nbsp;was skillfully captured using a Mavic Pro.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-rdkiijc6hs.jpg\" /></p><h2>Geometry of liquid gold</h2><p><a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/geometry-of-liquid-gold\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Javier del Cerro captured this brilliant aerial snap</a>&nbsp;of the amazing symmetry of the olive tree groves of Castilla La Mancha, Spain.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-pzaveci0q7.jpg\" /></p><h2>Peace, Spain by luckydron</h2><p>Luis Saguar Domingo, a 24-year-old, said he got his drone as a gift at Christmas and was in Madrid looking for a nice place to fly the new drone. He feels relaxed when flying simply because of all the beautiful landscapes he's able to see, and when he took this picture, he thought it was \"really cool and symmetrical\". From this point of view, Domingo said it is really \"hard taking a pic like that\".</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-a42uhhufid.jpg\" /></p><h2>Elements</h2><p>This astoundingly beautiful image of the landscapes of Iceland is actually&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/elements-c04f4d52-d4cf-417b-aec8-41b374a31ade\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">12 separate images stitched into one</a>. A brilliant panoramic shot of the surroundings with the cloud-covered mountaintops and flowing rivers cutting through the landscape.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-gvuicucbts.jpg\" /></p><h2>Two moo by Luke Bell</h2><p>Luke Bell, a Cape Town-based videographer and photographer, said he took this photo on a cold, early morning in South Africa on a farm near Stellenbosch. \"Two cows drinking from a nearby dam caught my eye when I saw their long shadows,\" he explained. \"I launched my drone to capture the scene in a way impossible with any other type of camera.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-9psxigmzu0.jpg\" /></p><h2>Baby lobsters breeding farm</h2><p>Above the waters of Vietnam,&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/lobsters-farm\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Trung Pham captured this image</a>&nbsp;of the lobster farms of the Phu Yen province. The striking colours and mix of man-made materials with nature make for an incredible photograph.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-dv4qixdgmn.jpg\" /></p><h2>Next Level by Macareuxprod</h2><p>Thibault Beguet, a 34-year-old photographer based in Rennes, Brittany, uses drones to take photos and make films for companies, agencies, TV, etc. This picture was captured &nbsp;with his girlfriend, Manon, while looking for a fun, original, and unusual way to announce they’re expecting to loved ones and friends: \"We love Normandy, the sea, and outdoor activities, so we choose naturally to shoot on the beach.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ct2kiotenf.jpg\" /></p><h2>Ugo le marin by Rga</h2><p>Romain Gaillard said this picture was taken early in the morning. \"I had gone to the beach to take some pictures,\" he explained. \"As I watched my children playing on the beach... I had the idea of using the sand as a large sheet of paper. So my two sons and myself drew a scene related to the sea - on the image you can see my oldest son.\"&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-bhnu8vft2x.jpg\" /></p><h2>Raising ducks by the river</h2><p>In the skies above Vietnam, a drone captures ducks being raised by the local farmers. A mass of white ducks relax on the peaceful riverways while the farmer works.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-x9nl2abqmp.jpg\" /></p><h2>Concrete jungle, Dubai, EAA by Bachirm</h2><p>Bachir Moukarzel, a 33-year-old Lebanese living in Dubai, is a cluster Financial controller in Rotana Hotels. This picture was shot at sunset time in Dubai at 6pm, while trying to capture an area which was a&nbsp;desert 10 years back but is now \"a concrete jungle with the highest buildings in Dubai\". He said every flight is a new adventure, even though he has been flying for ages, as each flight \"has its own taste\".</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-kmhj8uwpcb.jpg\" /></p><h2>When in Rome</h2><p>The Roman&nbsp;Colosseum is an incredible sight from the ground and from most angles. It's a marvel of architecture and a fantastic view of our history. Just when you thought it couldn't get more impressive, along comes this image by Mauri Pagliai showing it in full nighttime splendor from the sky.&nbsp;</p><p>This image was selected for one of the&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/ancient-moonlight\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"follow noopener\">People's Choice Prizes in the Sky Pixel contest</a>.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-e5klyspvcj.jpg\" /></p><h2>Not a small Hong Kong island</h2><p>Like a scene out of Inception, this drone photo captured with a Phantom 4 Pro shows a dream-like view of Hong Kong. A collection of 43 photos was just to create this amazing view and it's certainly impressive.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-qrm3nxlui7.jpg\" /></p><h2>Icelandic waterfall</h2><p>A wonderful Mavic Pro photo of the landscapes of Iceland and one of the many ice-encrusted waterfalls visible across the landscapes.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-qvle2n6zvi.jpg\" /></p><h2>Fire and ice</h2><p>Another brilliant Mavic Pro photo. This time from Yellowstone National Park in the US. The icy surface below shows brilliant colours as hot sulfur water finds its way through the snow.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-8nxtgij6ua.jpg\" /></p><h2>Lighthouse of Smögen</h2><p>A perfectly timed photograph of a lighthouse in Sweden shows the sun setting through the top. The brilliant red of the tip shining brightly for all to see. An empty horizon stretches off into the background. Brilliantly simple, wonderfully framed and fantastic use of a Mavic Pro.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-jhrg9qvcfc.jpg\" /></p><h2>A lion's eye view</h2><p>The king of the jungle is also perfect fodder for a fantastic aerial snap. This brilliant image shows a lion disturbed by the sounds of the drone, but not put out by its presence. Not often you get to safely view a wild animal in this manner unless you happen to be hiding in a nearby tree.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-iudiqopxm9.jpg\" /></p><h2>Buddy</h2><p>Dolphins are awesome, aren't they? Even more so when you get to see them like this at home in their natural habitat in incredibly crystal clear waters off the coast of Western Australia.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-y45kl7xjwe.jpg\" /></p><h2>Central Park in the winter</h2><p>New York City certainly sees some regular snowfall. The city's park looks incredible from this angle - even more so when sprinkled in wintery snow.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ombld0gcew.jpg\" /></p><h2>A bird's eye view of Lombard Street, San Francisco</h2><p>Most people will be able to identify this as the famous Lombard Street - reportedly \"the crookedest street in the world\". This windy road is certainly iconic and this drone photo is equally fantastic.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-nnwp7xahut.jpg\" /></p><h2>Tatahatso Point</h2><p>This brilliant image shows&nbsp;Tatahatso Point at the Grand Canyon. A popular photography spot, but not often seen from the sky.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ir1ixk9tqh.jpg\" /></p><h2>Novo Mesto,&nbsp;Slovenia</h2><p>This incredible sight is seen in the town of&nbsp;Novo Mesto, near the border of Croatia. A lush green landscape, winding river and close-knit community can be easily seen from the sky.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-4tbu2ywlgh.jpg\" /></p><h2>Metamorphosis</h2><p>This isn't just a small jetty into beautiful waters. Which is no mean feat.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ckvpyqrxmt.jpg\" /></p><h2>Stylish symmetry</h2><p>This simple photo wasn't snapped as high in the sky as some of the others on our list, but that's doesn't make it great. Even more so with the brilliant symmetry.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-k4zsynvfl9.jpg\" /></p><h2>A lonesome home</h2><p>In the dusty plains, a lonely house sits surrounded by nothing but dust, brush and the occasional tree. But who needs roads when you can fly? Certainly not this drone.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-rphoyn4sxr.jpg\" /></p><h2>Santa Maddalena village, Italy</h2><p>This incredible photo shows the beautiful green hills and surroundings of&nbsp;Santa Maddalena in Italy. A brilliantly colourful shot of nature made possible by a man-made drone.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-bldiyprazj.jpg\" /></p><h2>The long ride</h2><p>This photo is actually the result of a number of different images stitched together to create the end result. This stitching gives the impression of a bending world that stretches off into infinity. We've&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.pocket-lint.com/cameras/news/141560-19-amazing-aerial-photographs-with-a-new-perspective-of-the-world\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">seen this style before</a>&nbsp;and have to say it's a pretty awesome way to capture drone photographs.&nbsp;</p><p>Jesper Guldbrand gives a bit more insight:</p><p>\"This series is called \"Mind bending\" and is shot during 2017 in different locations of Sweden. Falun is a great city for mountain biking. This photo shows it. 20 images stitched together. A process that took about 1.5 months.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-3rugovifae.jpg\" /></p><h2>Night line</h2><p>This image shows a Chinese fisherman working in the waters, plying their trade. This aerial view was chosen as the runner-up in the professional story category. We'd highly recommend&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/13056109-adb4-4642-943e-c0f06deeb989\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">checking out the rest of the images too</a>.&nbsp;</p><p>The photographer commented:</p><p>\"Autumn season is the season of harvest, full of golden fruit is the earth's contribution to the hard work of mankind.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-uydivcr1k2.jpg\" /></p><h2>The land of the Earth</h2><p>This image is a part of a collection of photos showing the damage industrial waste has done to the landscape. Although showing waves of beautiful colour, these aerial photographs actually demonstrate the damage mankind has done to the world we inhabit.&nbsp;</p><p>The&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/18-1\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">photographer commented</a>:&nbsp;</p><p>\"The rapid development of human civilization has brought a series of negative effects. The environment is polluted and the ecology is destroyed. At present, the status quo of pollution in the earth is very harsh, forming a staggering \"earth 殇\"! Mankind must reflect on the triumphant industry development model, truly implement the policy of transforming the development mode and achieve sustainable social and economic development. Face the devastation of the earth, forever scars. Environmental pollution must be managed, otherwise, there will be no complete earth. Without protection of the environment, mankind will perish. Abstract images can instead better express the environmental impact of industrial pollution. Although these industrial pollution-related environments, details and colours can produce an attractive charm, the appearance does not represent the essence of spectacular colourful pictures may be very ugly nature, it is dirty, very evil. Human beings are rich in invention and creativity. They can also create a distinctive visual beauty in the process of industrial pollution and destruction of nature. The author recorded the destroyed land in aerial photography. This group of photos (18) 2017 shot in a mine tailings.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-yobesnhyeq.jpg\" /></p><h2>Woman in the wash</h2><p>From the shores of&nbsp;Taiwan, this aerial image captures the photographer laying by the edge of the water, the whitewash of the waves blending with her white dress. This brilliant photograph was nominated as a professional image in the portrait category.&nbsp;</p><p>The photographer, Bobo,&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/dji_0004-jpg-f88ff354-58c7-4701-9af2-2a6377e87ece\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">commented about this image</a>:</p><p>\"This is my Taiwan film, Hualien's coastline is steep cliffs and secluded sea, steep terrain, step by step is the deep sea. I've always wanted a special perspective, so try my best to try that as Mavic flies over the coastline, I find the waves on the coast flashes beautifully between dark grey gravel and turquoise water, dark and light. The contrast was very strong. When the waves fell toward the shore and retreated, they showed a vast and euphemistic shape, reminding me of the tail end of the whale, and finished the work. I pressed the shutter when the spray and the skirt were handed over to make the skirt and the sea wave blend together and have a sense of extension, leaving the work with an attachment and a similar space. With this idea, I shot a series of compositions in different forms continuously. The whole process was very exciting. Unfortunately, it was a cloudy day. If it is sunny, the overall color of the works will be even more gorgeous.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-q1xvmz5ve0.jpg\" /></p><h2>Elemental</h2><p>This aerial photograph was captured at 1,500 feet above the rivers of Iceland. This aerial image is part of a collection captured using the&nbsp;DJI Spark&nbsp;a small but clearly capable drone.&nbsp;</p><p>Zeng Xinmin commented about this image:</p><p>\"Anchang Ancient Town is one of the four famous ancient towns in Shaoxing, Zhejiang Province is the first batch of published historical and cultural towns. Was built in the Northern Song Dynasty, after the war, repeatedly burned, and rebuilt in the Ming and Qing Dynasties, the architectural style inherits the typical characteristics of Jiangnan Water Village, a water, simple and elegant, its speciality Anchang sausage, or \"sauce\" The poultry meat, etc. Only you can not think of, there is no Anchang \"wax\", \"sauce\" can not. It is the hometown of Shaoxing Master.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-tdbt3myipa.jpg\" /></p><h2>Inle Lake fishing show</h2><p>This image highlights the show the fishermen put on for tourists on the Inle Lake in Burma, but actually represents their traditional fishing methods in action. A fishing boat approaching the shore is flocked by seagulls, no doubt trying to snag an easy catch of their own.&nbsp;</p><p>\"One of my favourite shots. An early morning in Newfoundland, I was hiking on the East Coast Trail when I heard a bunch of seagulls. I quickly launched my drone to find-out what was causing the mayhem. It was a small cod fishing boat steaming towards the harbour, a truly magical moment.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-p8be9yqohj.jpg\" /></p><h2>Sun's Up, Nets Out</h2><p>This snap shows a fisherman on his boat on the waters of Inle Lake. It is threatened as the environment is changing. I was able to witness many scenes of wildlife and I can guarantee you this is the most beautiful thing I have ever seen. Incredible and unique shot above a polar bear in Nunavut, Baffin area during wildlife reportage in Nunavut and Greenland.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-5v3p4ohogk.jpg\" /></p><h2>Baby lobsters breeding farm</h2><p>Above the waters of Vietnam,&nbsp;<a href=\"https://www.skypixel.com/photos/lobsters-farm\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Trung Pham captured this image</a>&nbsp;of the lobster farms of the Phu Yen province. The striking colours and mix of man-made materials with nature make for an incredible photograph.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-a5dbfy9sdy.jpg\" /></p><h2>Raising ducks by the river</h2><p>In the skies above Vietnam, a drone captures ducks being raised by the local farmers. He noticed an empty tennis court that “just stood out like a treasured story in a book of empty words”. After a few takes, two people came by to play some tennis and seemed confused watching him lay on the ground. When he was done, he showed them his photo and they&nbsp;said, \"Ohhhh! I get it!\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-h0bqzhatv6.jpg\" /></p><h2>La Vijanera, Spain by feelingmovie</h2><p>Javier Bustamante, a 32-year-old designer, said he took this photo while at La Vijanera, a winter carnival that takes place in the town of Silió in Cantabria (Spain) on the first Sunday of each year. \"This party consists on a group of hunters who want to capture a bear,\" he explained. \"(Sic) Tour the village representing the capture of the bear... This photo is the end of the party in which the bear is captured.\"</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-thoszfsvuy.jpg\" /></p><h2>Ice formation By Florian</h2><p>Florian Ledoux, a 27-year-old who recently moved to Reykjavik to get closer to the Arctic, started to photograph in Greenland in 2014 to “report changes in Inuit culture and to witness the beauty of this huge land”. This photo was taken during winter in East Greenland - one of the most remote place on Earth. He said he attempted to fly here several times, and that his drone got attacked by two Gyrfalcon.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-6sj2leaqay.jpg\" /></p><h2>Waterlily, Vietnam by helios1412</h2><p>A beautiful shot from above the waterways of Vietnam shows a lone worker wading deep in the water.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-ejnpiigfe4.jpg\" /></p><h2>Infinite Road by Calin Stan</h2><p>Calin Stan, a 30-year-old who has worked in the photography business for more than a decade and owns his own business, said his drone image is of the Cheia DN1A road that takes you to Transylvania in Romania. Or, as the legend says, this is the view that \"Count Dracula himself saw on his nocturnal flight\", Stan explained. He actually first captured the image for the Transylvania Roads Project.</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-phiabr0ojn.jpg\" /></p><h2>Basilica del Voto Nacional</h2><p>An amazing sun-bathed view of the&nbsp;Basilica del Voto Nacional, a Roman Catholic church that dominates the horizon of&nbsp;Quito, Ecuador. The amazing church was blessed by the Pope in 1985 and is one of the biggest attractions of the area. It also makes for an impressive drone photo as Alex Javier proved with this snap using his Phantom 4 Pro.&nbsp;</p><p><img src=\"https://cdn.pocket-lint.com/r/s/660x/assets/images/133911-drones-feature-best-drone-photos-ever-taken-image1-l6uz1ic2oe.jpg\" /></p><h2>Daily Geometry by&nbsp;Petra Leary</h2><p>If you're going to have a list of the best drone photos around, it only seems fair to include a real award winner. These images are part of a series called \"Daily Geometry\" by award-winning&nbsp;aerial photographer Petra Leary. This collection of photos saw the aerial photography master selected for the shortlist of the Zeiss Photography Award 2019. Brilliant lines, bold eye-catching colours and amazing symmetry from simple urban locales.&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;</p> </img>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Fri, 27 Mar 2020 13:35:00
